types.section:
{{fr-adj}}

# of or from {{w|Les Maillys}}, in the department of [[Côte-d’Or]].
# of or from {{w|Maillot}}, in the department of [[Yonne]].
# of or from {{w|Mailly-Champagne}}, in the department of [[Marne]].

# of or from {{w|Mailly-sur-Seille}}, in the department of [[Meurthe-et-Moselle]].
# of or from {{w|Mesnil-Sellières}}, in the department of [[Aube]].
types.html:
maillotin (feminine maillotine, masculine plural maillotins, feminine plural maillotines)

  1. of or from Les Maillys, in the department of Côte-d’Or.
  2. of or from Maillot, in the department of Yonne.
  3. of or from Mailly-Champagne, in the department of Marne.
  4. of or from Mailly-Maillet, in the department of Somme.
  5. of or from Mailly-sur-Seille, in the department of Meurthe-et-Moselle.
  6. of or from Mesnil-Sellières, in the department of Aube.
trans: of or from Les Maillys, in the department of Côte-d’Or.
